data.eml:eml: A review of the Japanese species of Barycnemis Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tersilochinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I. (2015): A review of the Japanese species of Barycnemis Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tersilochinae). Zootaxa 3963 (3): 425-433, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3963.3.6
